MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH27 postcode area of Kirknewton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 04.54am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:38am on Friday, 23 April 2021
